attributes.action: allow scientists to clone a First Class Men's or Women'sTennis champion to win Wimbledon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This will, of course, need some support from the Human In Vitro Fertilization & Embryology Committee - surely some of them must be tennis fans?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
